text:
Amana has~ interesting places!
Like theme parks!

It's also nice to have places where you can relax,
somewhere you can spread your wings without a care...

Hmm... Places where you can relax and have fun...
I wonder what's out there~

This...!
An exhibition of various futons...!

Wow, you can actually lie down on them
Looks so comfortable...!

It's a place where you can relax and have fun,
where everyone's wishes come true~!
